org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.balancer

Class StochasticLoadBalancer.ReadRequestCostFunction

  • java.lang.Object

        • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.balancer.StochasticLoadBalancer.ReadRequestCostFunction
  • Enclosing class:
    StochasticLoadBalancer

    public static class StochasticLoadBalancer.ReadRequestCostFunction
extends StochasticLoadBalancer.CostFromRegionLoadFunction
    Compute the cost of total number of read requests The more unbalanced the higher the computed cost will be. This uses a rolling average of regionload.
